CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to EchoWave?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {below} EchoWave in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing OracleFeed relative to Starburst Online?
SRP.A: OracleFeed is {below} Starburst Online in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaStream relative to OracleFeed?
SRP.A: NovaStream is {above} OracleFeed in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total ad revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total ad revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {NovaStream}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is NovaStream's minimum Ad Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: NovaStream's minimum Ad Revenue is in {2005}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is NovaStream's maximum Ad Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: NovaStream's maximum Ad Revenue is in {1995}.

NC.Q: Was the total Ad Revenue in 2001 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total ad revenue in 2001 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2005, did the total Ad Revenue experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total ad revenue between 2002 and 2005 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 2006.

NC.Q: Was the total Ad Revenue in 1995 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total ad revenue in 1995 was {higher} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 2000, was the average total Ad Revenue higher or lower than between 1999 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total ad revenue between 1995 and 2000 was {higher} than between 1999 and 2000.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst Online} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst Online and EchoWave first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst Online and EchoWave first exchanged leading positions in {1996}.
